fields.v5: Your Java-Version is not supported.-br- Please use at least version -br-The program will now exit und you will be redirected.
fields.v6: There is no source-PDF-document.-br-The program will now exit und you will be redirected.
fields.v7: There is no identifier/filename for the PDF-document.-br-The program will now exit und you will be redirected.
fields.v8: The destination-serverurl is not valid.-br-The program will now exit und you will be redirected.
fields.v9: The POST-request does not have an identifier.-br-The program will now exit und you will be redirected.
fields.v10: A fatal error occured.-br-The program will now exit und you will be redirected.
fields.v11: The document could not be saved.
fields.v12: The documentstructure is not valid and can not be signed.
fields.v14: The configuration could not be saved.
fields.v15: There is a problem with the certificates on your RUBCard.
fields.v16: An unknown error occured during the signing process.
fields.v21: The entered PIN must be numeric and exactly six characters long.
fields.v22: Please insert your RUBCard into the smartcard-reader.
fields.v23: The cryptoprovider could not initialize your RUBCard properly.
fields.v24: An error occurred during card access.
fields.v26: The choosen smardcard-reader has been removed.-br-Please choose another in the configuration area.
fields.v27: There is an error in the reader device.
fields.v28: The cryptoprovider seems to be already logged in.-br-Please pull out your RUBCard, insert it and try again.
fields.v29: The crypto provider reports an unknown error.
fields.v30: The cryptoprovider could not be loaded.-br-The file was not found.
fields.v31: An error occurred during file access.
fields.v32: The crypto provider could not be logged out correctly.
fields.v33: The initiated process stops responding.-br-Please try again.
fields.v34: An unknown error occurred in the crypto provider.
fields.v35: Please draw a rectangle with your right mouse button.-br-Then place the stamp and click your left mouse button to initiate the signing process.
fields.v37: An error occured during the upload process.
fields.v38: The PDF uploadserver is not reachable.
fields.v39: An error occurred in the uploadmodul.-br-The program will now exit und you will be redirected.
fields.v40: The signed PDF documents were successfully loaded on the server.-br-The program will now exit und you will be redirected.
fields.v41: An error occured during the upload process. Further information can be found on the following page.-br-The program will now exit und you will be redirected.
fields.v42: Error determining upload status.-br-Further information can be found on the following page.-br-The program will now exit und you will be redirected.
fields.v43: The upload server does not respont.-br-Further information can be found on the following page.-br-The program will now exit und you will be redirected.
fields.v44: An error occurred in the system.-br-Further information can be found on the following page.-br-The program will now exit und you will be redirected.
fields.v46: While executing the configurator, an error occurred.-br-The program will now exit und you will be redirected.
fields.v47: Please select the smart card reader which is used for the signing process.
fields.v48: Please select the path to the crypto provider:
fields.v60: Cannot finish the automatic configuration.-br-Please enter the path to a crypto provider.
fields.v61: Cannot finish the automatic configuration.-br-Please select a smart card reader in the configuration area.
fields.v69: tooltip=Show all attachments of this PDF document
fields.v70: tooltip=Show all signatures of this PDF document
fields.v71: Cannot create GUI-br-The program will now exit und you will be redirected.
fields.v72: Cannot decode base64 encoded PDF document.-br-The program will now exit und you will be redirected.
fields.v73: Cannot load PDF document from lokal file.-br-The program will now exit und you will be redirected.
fields.v74: There is an error in the download modul.-br-The program will now exit und you will be redirected.
fields.v75: The PDF source server is not reachable.-br-The program will now exit und you will be redirected.
fields.v76: Cannot download PDF document. An unknown error occurred.-br-The program will now exit und you will be redirected.
fields.v77: The PDF document is corrupt and can not be loaded.-br-The program will now exit und you will be redirected.
fields.v83: Please place the signature stamp. You have to draw a rectangle on the document by pressing and holding the right mouse button. Place the stamp then at any position/page of the document. Know click the left mouse button to fix the stamp and continue the signing process.
fields.v84: Initiate the signing process by clicking the red "Sign"-Button.
fields.v85: The document was not signed properly. The upload process was canceled.
fields.v87: Please enter your PIN using the card reader
fields.v101: The card-reader that is in the configurationfile, could not be loaded.
fields.v107: The entered PIN is wrong.\nPlease note that your PIN will be locked after the third incorrect try.
fields.v108: An error occured.\nFor more information see the logs.
fields.v109: The reader can not be initialized.
fields.v110: Please choose a card reader in the configuration.
fields.v111: The maximum number of opened documents has been reached.\nAll other documents were discarded.
fields.v112: Some documents could not be loaded:
fields.v113: Please choose at least one document to remove.
fields.v114: The request needs some further information to complete. Please fill out all fields and click the 'Save'-Button.
fields.v123: No documents loaded. Please load at least one document.
fields.v124: Attention: All red marked fields will be overwritten.
fields.v125:
All documents now have the necessary user data.
Do you want to proceed with the upload process?

Click the 'no'-button if you want to correct or verify the entered data.
fields.v127: Please note the messages on the next page
